alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Collier, southeastern Hendry, northern Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Miccosukee Indian Reservation, or 32 miles south of Montura, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Orangetree, Copeland, Hendry Correctional, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Big Cypress National Preserve, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Big Corkscrew Island, Royal Palm Hammock, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Bunker Hill, West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd and Miles City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
